example.text: In mice, inactivation of the MEF2C gene, which is the first MEF2 isoform expressed during embryonic development, which led to cardiac morphogenetic defects, vascular abnormalities and lethality by embryonic day 9.5 (Lin et al., 1997, 1998; Bi et al., 1999).

cardiac morphogenetic defects, vascular abnormalities and lethality by embryonic day 9.5

example.text: By direct sequencing of aberrant SSCA conformers were revealed 15 different mutations in a total of 18 unrelated families and 13 single patients. Of these, 10 were novel (a C----A transversion in the splice acceptor sequence of the last intron of the only ERCC-3 allele that lead to a 4 bp insertion in the mRNA and an inactivating frameshift in the C-terminus of the protein, and 1 mutation predicted to affect normal splicing).

a 4 bp insertion in the mRNA and an inactivating frameshift in the C-terminus of the protein

example.text: By direct sequencing of aberrant SSCA conformers were revealed 15 different mutations in a total of 18 unrelated families and 13 single patients. Of these, 10 were novel (two frameshifts and a splice site mutation that led to truncated OA1 proteins; a deletion of a threonine codon at position 290; and four missense mutations, and 1 mutation predicted to affect normal splicing).
example.arg: two frameshifts and a splice site mutation
truncated OA1 proteins; a deletion of a threonine codon at position 290; and four missense mutations

example.text: This G:C base pair is also the strongest determinant in a point mutation at the 5 splicing site of the third intron which leads to ligation of the second to the fourth exon (Lagrange et al., 1998).

ligation of the second to the fourth exon

example.text: This G:C base pair is also the strongest determinant in inactivation of the MEF2C gene, which led to cardiac morphogenetic defects, vascular abnormalities and lethality by embryonic day 9.5 (Lagrange et al., 1998).
example.arg: inactivation of the MEF2C gene
cardiac morphogenetic defects, vascular abnormalities and lethality by embryonic day 9.5

example.text: This G:C base pair is also the strongest determinant in two frameshifts and a splice site mutation that leads to truncated OA1 proteins; a deletion of a threonine codon at position 290; and four missense mutations (Lagrange et al., 1998).
example.arg: two frameshifts and a splice site mutation
truncated OA1 proteins; a deletion of a threonine codon at position 290; and four missense mutations
